lat.description: Latitude of the post. Must be in range -90 and 90

long.description: Longitude of the post. Must be in range -180 and 180

message.description: Text to display in the post

tags.description: Tags this post was tagged with. Read only

relevance.description: Relevance of this post. Can be used to compare it with other posts and decide which to display. Read only

user.description: Unique user ID of the user who posted the message. Read only

_id.description: Unique mongoDB ID of the post. Read only
